description: This file defines the class LangChainKnowledgeBase, which extends AgentKnowledge, and provides methods for searching documents using langchain components, loading data, and checking existence. It integrates with langchain_core modules and handles retriever creation and document retrieval.

classes.name: LangChainKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages knowledge base operations using langchain components, including searching, loading, and existence checking.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search for relevant documents based on a query, with optional filtering and document count.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads data into the knowledge base using a provided loader function.

methods.name: exists
methods.description: Checks if the knowledge base exists; currently always returns True with a warning.
